Package spaces.magenta_spaces

Class JobSearch

java.lang.Object
spaces.ColoredSpace
spaces.MagentaSpace
spaces.magenta_spaces.JobSearch
public class JobSearch
extends MagentaSpace
Class implementing a job search space.

Players on a job search space choose a career and salary between their current cards and one career and salary card drawn from their respective decks.

    Creates a job search space object

  • Constructor Details

    • JobSearch

      public JobSearch​(int index, int nextIndex)
      Creates a job search space object

      In particular, a job search space has its attributes initialized as follows:

      • Its name is assigned as "Job Search".
      • Its index on the board is assigned the passed parameter index.
      • Its next index is assigned the passed parameter nextIndex.
      Parameters:
      index - the index of the space on the board
      nextIndex - the index of the next space the player can move to from this space

  • Method Details

    • drawCareerCard

      public java.util.ArrayList<CareerCard> drawCareerCard​(Player currPlayer, CareerCardDeck d)
      Returns the career cards a player can choose from

      On a job search space, a player draws a career card and chooses between their current career card and the drawn card.

      Parameters:
      currPlayer - current player with turn
      d - CareerCardDeck object of the game
      Returns:
      the career cards a player can choose from

    • drawSalaryCard

      public java.util.ArrayList<SalaryCard> drawSalaryCard​(Player currPlayer, SalaryCardDeck d)
      Returns the salary cards a player can choose from

      On a job search space, a player draws a salary card and chooses between their current salary card and the drawn card.

      Parameters:
      currPlayer - current player with turn
      d - SalaryCardDeck object of the game
      Returns:
      the salary cards a player can choose from

    • executeCareer

      public void executeCareer​(Player currPlayer, java.util.ArrayList<CareerCard> careerCards, CareerCardDeck d, int index)
      Executes one of the actions associated with this space; that is, the player chooses between two career cards

      On a job search space, the player draws a career card and chooses the card to keep between his current card and the drawn card.

      Parameters:
      currPlayer - current player with turn
      careerCards - list of career cards the player can choose from
      d - CareerCardDeck object of the game
      index - index of the chosen career card in the passed array list

    • executeSalary

      public void executeSalary​(Player currPlayer, java.util.ArrayList<SalaryCard> salaryCards, SalaryCardDeck d, int index)
      Executes one of the actions associated with this space; that is, the player chooses between two salary cards

      On a job search space, the player draws a salary card and chooses the card to keep between his current card and the drawn card.

      Parameters:
      currPlayer - current player with turn
      salaryCards - list of salary cards the player can choose from
      d - SalaryCardDeck object of the game
      index - index of the chosen salary card in the passed array list

    • getInfo

      public java.lang.String getInfo​(Player currPlayer)
      Returns the string to be used as a prompt in the actual gameplay when the player is on a job search space

      In particular, the returned string reads as follows: "[Player name], you are on a Job Search space. Choose a career and salary card from the available options."

      Specified by:
      getInfo in class MagentaSpace
      Parameters:
      currPlayer - current player with turn
      Returns:
      string to be used as a prompt in the actual gameplay when the player is on a job search space
